description: Kevin Hillery and Shannon Beydler faced many challenges together, which only proved to strengthen their bond. The couple were married on July 3 in Warrenton, Va.
title: Overcoming Obstacles with Love
title_page: Overcoming Obstacles with Love - The New York Times
text: Bridesmaids and groomsmen gathered before the procession at the wedding of Shannon Beydler and Kevin Hillery, who were married July 3 in the gardens of Airlie, a neo-Georgian conference center and hotel in Warrenton, Va. The couple had met in August 2012 while attending a baseball game with friends in Nationals Park in Washington. Although they were not seated next to each another, Ms. Beydler knew she wanted to learn more about Mr. Hillery, who had become paralyzed from the waist down as a result of a 2011 mountain biking accident.
